meaningMnemonic: It's weird to think of having <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>energy</kanji>. But, what gives you energy? You do it one time every couple of seconds. That would be taking breaths. So, "one energy" is <vocabulary>one breath</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the ones you learned with the individual kanji, though いち from 一 is shortened to いっ.
